data.name: NoActionNeeded.Title
data.value: Based on the answers you have given, you do not need to report packaging data

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AmountYouSupplyDescription1
data.value: This is because your organisation will handle or supply less than 25 tonnes of packaging in 2022.

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AmountYouSupplyDescription1Parent
data.value: This is because your group will handle or supply less than 25 tonnes of packaging in 2022.

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AmountYouSupplyDescription2
data.value: You may need to comply with the extended producer responsibility for packaging regulations in the future if the amount of packaging you handle and supply in a year is 25 tonnes or more.

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AmountYouSupplyDescription2Parent
data.value: You may need to comply with the extended producer responsibility for packaging regulations in the future if the amount of packaging your organisation, or a combination of your organisation together with one or more of its subsidiaries, or a combination of two or more of its subsidiaries, handle and supply in a year is 25 tonnes or more.

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AmountYouSupplyDescription3
data.value: Your parent company may need to register for extended producer responsibility (EPR) for packaging if the combined annual amount of packaging handled or supplied by any subsidiaries that do not meet the criteria is 25 tonnes or more.

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AmountYouSupplyDescriptionParent
data.value:
• the turnover for your organisation exceeds £1 million
  • the turnover for your organisation together with one or more of its subsidiaries exceeds £1 million
  • the combined turnover for two or more of the group's subsidiaries exceeds £1 million

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AmountYouSupplyTitle1
data.value: What happens next

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AmountYouSupplyTitle2
data.value: How the regulations may affect your parent company

data.name: NoActionNeeded.HandleSupplyPackagingDescription1
data.value: This is because the way in which your organisation handles or supplies packaging does not meet the criteria for the regulations.

data.name: NoActionNeeded.HandleSupplyPackagingDescription2
data.value: You may need to comply with the extended producer responsibility (EPR) for packaging regulations in the future if your organisation changes the way it handles and supplies packaging.

data.name: NoActionNeeded.HandleSupplyPackagingTitle1
data.value: What happens next

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AnnualTurnoverDescription2
data.value: You may need to comply with the extended producer responsibility (EPR) for packaging regulations in the future if the turnover for your organisation exceeds £1 million.

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AnnualTurnoverDescription2Parent
data.value: You may need to comply with the extended producer responsibility (EPR) for packaging regulations in the future if any of the following apply:

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AnnualTurnoverDescription3Parent
data.value:
• the turnover for your organisation exceeds £1 million
  • the turnover for your organisation together with one or more of its subsidiaries exceeds £1 million
  • the combined turnover for two or more of the group's subsidiaries exceeds £1 million

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AnnualTurnoverTitle1
data.value: What happens next

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AnnualTurnoverTitle2
data.value: How the regulations may affect your parent company

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AnnualTurnoverDescription3
data.value: Your parent company may need to register for the EPR for packaging regulations if the combined annual turnover for any subsidiaries that do not meet the turnover criteria is over £1 million.

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AnnualTurnoverDescriptionParent
data.value: This is because your group’s turnover was less than £1 million, according to its most recent published accounts.

data.name: NoActionNeeded.AnnualTurnoverDescriptionOrganization
data.value: This is because your organisation’s turnover was less than £1 million, according to its most recent published accounts.
